name: Dungeonforge - Be the Ultimate Dungeon Master
blurb: Swords-flying, action RPG where you drive and shape the gameworld and everyone has a chance to tell their own unique story.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Early Backer Special #1\r\n==============================\r\nFirst 150 backers get the game and a single-character account! Choose one of our five characters to play with. This gives you access to 20+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of your chosen character, creation tools, and all player-made content with one character to explore it with!

Get the game and a single-character account! Choose one of our five characters to play with. This gives you access to 20+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of your chosen character, creation tools, and all player-made content!

Early Backer Special #2\r\n==============================\r\nFirst 100 backers get a full, five-character copy of the game! This gives you access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it!

Dungeonforge Buddy Pack - Single Character Edition\r\n==============================\r\nGet one single-character account for you and another so a buddy can come adventuring with you and explore the adventures you create! Both of you get access to 20+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of your chosen character, creation tools, and all player-made content with one character to explore it with!

Last-Minute Backer Level\r\n==============================\r\nGet a full, five-character copy of the game when the game is released! This gives you access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it! Early Access not included at this level. For Early Access, check out our $20, Dungeon Master Level.

Dungeon Master Level
==============================
Get a full, five-character copy of the game! This gives you access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it!

Early access codes included for all pledge levels that get the game!

Dungeon Master Level - Buddy Single-Character Edition\r\n==============================\r\nGet a full, five-character copy of the game for you and an additional single-character copy so a buddy can come adventuring with you and explore the adventures you create!! This gives you access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it! Meanwhile your buddy gets access to 20+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of your chosen character, creation tools, and all player-made content with one character to explore it with!

Dungeon Master Level - Buddy Full-Game Edition ($5 off full price!)\r\n==============================\r\nGet a full, five-character copy of the game for you and an additional full copy so a buddy can come adventuring with you and explore the adventures you create!! You both get access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it!

Game Night Pack ($20 off full price!)\r\n==============================\r\nGather your buddies around for game night just like in your D&D days! Get four, full copies of the game for you and your buddies to enjoy together! You each get access to 100+ hours of first-party story content exploring the back story of all five of our characters, creation tools, all player-made content and you can use any of the five characters to explore it!

Game Night Pack+ ($30 off full price!)\r\n==============================\r\nSame as previous reward but tack on a fifth full copy so you can fully round out a five-man party and your savings are now $30 off full price!

Hero Level - Out of US Edition============================== You get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a weapon to be used in the game! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Home. Lastly you will receive a special credit on the Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

Hero Level\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a weapon to be used in the game! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Home. Lastly you will receive a special credit on the Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

Hero Level - Game Night Edition (Out of US)\r\n============================== Receive the previous rewards, plus four additional full copies of the game to have game night with your buddies like it's your D&D days!

Hero Level - Game Night Edition\r\n==============================\r\nReceive the previous rewards, plus four additional full copies of the game to have game night with your buddies like it's your D&D days!

Legendary Hero Level\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a mob-level monster! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment, and a 3D printed miniature of one of the game's characters. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Manse. Lastly you will receive a special Deluxe Plaque with a message personalized by you on Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

Legendary Hero - Game Night Edition\r\n==============================\r\nSame as previous reward, plus four additional full copies of the game to have game night with your buddies like it's your D&D days!

Conquering Hero\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a commander-level monster! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment and two 3D printed miniatures. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Keep. Lastly you will also get to design a personalized statue in your own likeness that will be placed in front of the Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

Conquering Hero - Game Night Edition\r\n==============================\r\nEverything in the previous reward, plus four additional full copies of the game to have game night with your buddies like it's your D&D days!

Demigod Level\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a miniboss-level monster! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment and three 3d printed miniatures. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Castle. Lastly you will also get to design a personalized statue of great size in your own likeness that will be placed in front of the Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

Demigod Level - Game Night Edition\r\n==============================\r\nSame as previous reward, plus four additional full copies of the game to have game night with your buddies like it's your D&D days!

Among the Gods
==============================
You get the full game with access to alpha versions of the game in addition to the beta. You get to design a boss-level monster! You also get a poster and a map of gameworld on parchment and four 3D printed miniatures. Further, your plot in Hero's Square in the game's central city will instantly upgraded from Tent to Castle in the Sky! Lastly you will also get to design a personalized statue of incredible size in your own likeness that will be placed in a central location in front of the Wall of Heroes located in the game's central city! Poster and map will be sent out ahead of the game's launch so you can show it off!

You also get four additional copies of the game for game night with your friends, so they can all pay homage to your greatness!

Creator God\r\n==============================\r\nSame as previous reward, but you also get to design the concept for the story campaign on of our characters along with our team! Choose either the Knight or the Ranger and you will be the one to write their story with us!
